Package natlang.rdg.libraries

Interface Summary
LibraryConstants This interface lists the constants that can be used in the dependency tree.
 

Class Summary
AdditiveLib AdditiveLib implements the causal part of the cue word taxonomy.
AdjLib This class inflects adjectives
ApLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category AP
CauseLib CauseLib implements the causal part of the cue word taxonomy.
ConjLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category CONJ (a conjunction)
ConstituentLib This class is the base-class of all constituent libraries.
ContrastLib ContrastLib implements the contrast part of the cue word taxonomy.
CpLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category CP
CueWordLib This class is the parent class for all classes holding information on cue words
DetLib This class inflects determiners
ExclLib  
InfLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category INF
MorphLib This is an abstract class with functionality to inflect words
NounLib This class inflects nouns
NpLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category SMAIN
OtiLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category OTI
PpartLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category PPART
PpLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category PP
PurposeLib PurposeLib implements the purpose part of the cue word taxonomy.
RelativeLib Library class for relative clauses.
RelLib Library class for relative clauses.
SmainLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category SMAIN
SrelLib  
SsubLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category SSUB
TemporalLib TemporalLib implements the temporal part of the cue word taxonomy.
TiLib This class is a library containing all rules concerning the syntactic category TI
VerbLib This class inflects verbs.
